import numpy as np
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = []
    for i in range(n):
        a.append([int(c) for c in input().split()])
    p = a.copy()
    mi = 9999
    x = 1
    (start, temp) = (a[0], [])
    a.remove(a[0])
    for _ in range(n - 1):
        l = len(a)
        for i in range(l):
            if min(abs(start[0] - a[i][0]), abs(start[1] - a[i][1])) < mi:
                mi = min(abs(start[0] - a[i][0]), abs(start[1] - a[i][1]))
                temp = a[i]
        start = temp
        x = np.bitwise_xor(x, p.index(start) + 1)
        a.remove(a[a.index(start)])
        mi = 9999
    print(x)

import numpy as np
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    a = []
    for i in range(n):
        a.append([int(c) for c in input().split()])
    p = a.copy()
    mi = 9999
    x = 1
    (start, temp) = (a[0], [])
    a.remove(a[0])
    for _ in range(n - 1):
        l = len(a)
        for i in range(l):
            if min(abs(start[0] - a[i][0]), abs(start[1] - a[i][1])) < mi:
                mi = min(abs(start[0] - a[i][0]), abs(start[1] - a[i][1]))
                temp = a[i]
        start = temp
        x = np.bitwise_xor(x, p.index(start) + 1)
        a.remove(a[a.index(start)])
        mi = 9999
    print(x)
